attributes.action: Katie Hopkins should be charged for commiting hate crimes.
attributes.additional_details: Katie Hopkins should face a police enquiry for her recent slurs on Palestinian's and for encouraging genocide. Although her previous statements may have been extremely offensive ( her vile attitude towards overweight people and towards children from a poor economic background), her recent messages have not only supported the murder of innocent Palestinians (she says "restart the bombing campaign") but have also categorised the race as "dirty rodents". Public figures are frequently investigated for much milder statements and she deserves to face justice for publicising such distasteful and thoughtless opinions.

rejection.details: This would be an operational matter for the police, in which Ministers and officials cannot intervene.
